conbody.p: Many people are familiar with an Apache/mod_php or Lighttpd/FastCGI kind of setup, where the web server automatically spawns the web application. With nginx, either for reverse proxying or FastCGI, this is not the case: you are responsible to run your own process. I strongly recommend a monitoring utility which will automatically restart your application in case it crashes. There are many great options out there, such as angel or daemontools.
